title: WANT
lyrics:
Masin sungan mogi taneun deushae burwanjeonhae
Tteugeoumui jeonguireul naeriryeo hae
Bonneungdo iseongmajeodo
Deo wonhage doel teni
Deo taoreuge dwae neon

Naccseon neukkim sonkkeute daha tago olla

Gwanneung sok mujagwiro peojyeoga

Geu ondo geugeosui poro

Deo wonhage doel teni

Deo taoreuge dwae neon



Hot hot deo cheoncheonhi

Neoreul aetaeuge hal

Hot hot hangye eopsi

Deouk ppajyeodeulgo sipge hal

Hot hot neoui simhae mit

Geu goyoreul kkaeul nal

Hot hot deo wonhage doel teni

Deo taoreuge dwae neon



Geumdanui sagwaneun dalgie neol yuhokhae

Chungdongeun gamgageul ikkeureo nae

Budeureoun heureum sok deo wonhage doel teni

Deo taoreuge dwae neon



Hot hot deo cheoncheonhi

Neoreul aetaeuge hal

Hot hot hangye eopsi

Deouk ppajyeodeulgo sipge hal

Hot hot neoui simhae mit

Geu goyoreul kkaeul nal

Hot hot deo wonhage doel teni

Deo taoreuge dwae neon



Deo won deo wonhage dwae

Deo won deo wonhage dwae

Deo won deo wonhage dwae

Deo wonhage doel teni

Deo taoreuge dwae neon



I’m your eyes dareun nun tteuge hal

I’m your toy neol sunsuhage hal

Mideobwa ne anui Self-control

Umjigyeo bwa ikkeullin Body and soul



Nun tteo neoui sorireul deureobwa

Neon mwol wonhae

Nan nega mollassdeon geol alge hal

Deo wonhage doel teni

Deo taoreuge dwae neon



Hot hot deo cheoncheonhi

Neoreul aetaeuge hal

Hot hot hangye eopsi

Deouk ppajyeodeulgo sipge hal

Hot hot neoui simhae mit

Geu goyoreul kkaeul nal

Hot hot deo wonhage doel teni

Deo taoreuge dwae neon



Deo won deo wonhage dwae

Deo won deo wonhage dwae

Deo won deo wonhage dwae

Deo wonhage doel teni

Deo taoreuge dwae neon
